    Class
    Description
    class 
    InflictDamage
    Class that implements a room effect that inflicts damage to the character
    Inflicts 10 damage to the player if it rolls < 5 on D6
    class 
    StealMoney
    Class that implements a room effect that steals money from the character
    Steals 10 money from the player if it doesn't roll 6 on D6
    class 
    Teleport
    Class that implements a room effect that teleports the character to a random room
    Teleports the player to a random room in the same floor causing the player to forget the visited rooms(doesn't apply with NorthStar item)
